about.about-1: I'm a very ambitious FullStack developer looking for a role in an established IT company with the opportunity to work with the latest technologies on challenging and diverse projects.
about.about-2: I'm quite confident, autodidactic, and hard working on improving my skills.
about.about-3: If I need to define myself in one sentence, I would say I have high social skills, I am a great team player and I am tech-obsessed!!!
